verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Great is Your faithfulness oh God newline Your wrestle with the sinner's heart newline You lead us by still waters and to mercy newline And nothing can keep us apart

verse.name: b1
verse.lines: So remember Your people newline Remember Your children newline Remember Your Promise newline Oh God

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Your grace is enough newline Your grace is enough newline Your grace is enough for me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Great is Your love and justice God newline You use the weak to lead the strong newline You lead us in the song of Your salvation newline And all Your people sing along
